ModMetaData.name: Xenohuman - Anthromorphs [Facial Animation Patch]
ModMetaData.author: HohenHeizen
ModMetaData.description:
Facial Animation Patches for Xenohuman - Anthromorphs, a mod by Ravenholme, Erin, and SnepDoesBlep. Based on facial animation patches done by Roboslob.
I plan to go through and upsize the heads, so there's that. --- Contains • Avianmorph • Bovinemorph • Caninemorph • Cervinemorph • Dragomorph • Felinemorph • Gnollmorph • Lagomorph • Vulpinemorph* [NEW]
Version <color=#FFD800>1.0.0</color>
